messages.subject: Info for PA (was:  Re: ???)
messages.msgSnippet: ... requirements in pa?  thank you so much! Check out nhen.org, for general info on homeschooling in PA, then take it from there.   Or search the yahoo groups
messages.messageBody:
"britt_mccollum" <brittsharpe@...> wrote:
>also, can anyone recommend a reliable site for unschooling
requirements in pa? thank you so much!>

Check out nhen.org, for general info on homeschooling in PA, then take
it from there. Or search the yahoo groups to see if there's a
homeschooling or unschooling group for PA. Hopefully someone here is
from your state and can help.
Jann

dh - dear husband
dd - dear daughter
ds - dear son

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] ???
messages.msgSnippet: the letter are for: DD-*_D_*arling or dear*_ D_*aughter DS- _*D*_arling or Dear _*S*_on DH- _*D*_arling or Dear *_H_*usband HTH-Hope This Helps,   Ruby
messages.messageBody:
the letter are for: DD-*_D_*arling or dear*_ D_*aughter
DS- _*D*_arling or Dear _*S*_on
DH- _*D*_arling or Dear *_H_*usband


HTH-Hope This Helps, Ruby

thing...what does dd, dh, and ds stand for? i've tried to figure it

unschooling requirements in pa? thank you so much!
britt
